hero.title: Nweta mfe na mmekọrịta ọ bụla
hero.subtitle: Anyị na-ewu ngwa AI, usoro automation, na ngwa ọgbara ọhụrụ na-eme ka ọrụ gị dị mfe, belata mgbalị aka, ma nyere azụmahịa gị aka ịga n'ihu ngwa ngwa.

services.heading: Ihe Anyị Na-eme
services.subtitle: Ngwọta teknụzụ zuru ezu nke dabara na mkpa azụmahịa gị

service1.title: Usoro AI & Automation
service1.description: Usoro nwere ọgụgụ isi na-eme ka ọrụ ugboro ugboro na-akpaghị aka ma nye nghọta site na data gị.

service2.title: Ngwa Webụ Ahaziri Ahazi
service2.description: Ngwa webụ nwere ike ịgbasa nke e wuru na React, Django, FastAPI, na teknụzụ ọgbara ọhụrụ.

service3.title: Njikọ API
service3.description: Njikọ na-enweghị nsogbu n'etiti ngwaọrụ na ọrụ gị maka usoro ọrụ ka mma.

service4.title: Ngwọta Ịkwụ Ụgwọ
service4.description: Nhazi ịkwụ ụgwọ echekwara nke nwere nkwado maka ọnụ ụzọ ámá Africa na mba ụwa.

service5.title: Mmụba Otu
service5.description: Ndị nrụpụta ọkachamara iji bulite otu gị ma mee ka nnyefe oru ngo dị ngwa ngwa.

service6.title: Ọzụzụ na Ndụmọdụ
service6.description: Ọzụzụ teknụzụ na ndụmọdụ atụmatụ maka AI, automation, na mmepe webụ.

about.heading: Iwu Ngwọta Teknụzụ Na-aga N'ihu
about.paragraph1: Sannex bụ ọkachamara na automation nke AI na-akwado, ngwa webụ ahaziri ahazi, na njikọ na-enweghị nsogbu na-enyere azụmahịa aka ịrụ ọrụ nke ọma.
about.paragraph2: N'ịbụ ndị nọ na Lagos, Nigeria, anyị na-arụ ọrụ na ụka, mahadum, mmalite, na ụlọ ọrụ gafee Africa na ụwa niile, na-enye ngwọta na-ejikọta nka teknụzụ na uru azụmahịa bara uru.
about.highlight2: Ọkachamara Fullstack na React, Django, FastAPI
about.highlight3: Ahụmahụ na ndị ahịa Africa na ụwa
about.highlight4: Lekwasị anya na ngwọta bara uru, nke na-aga n'ihu

cta.heading: Ị nwere oru ngo n'uche?
cta.subtitle: Ka anyị kparịta ụka banyere otu anyị nwere ike inyere gị aka ịmepụta ngwọta AI, ịmegharị usoro ọrụ, ma ọ bụ ịmepụta ngwa ahaziri iche na-ebuli azụmahịa gị.

footer.description: Anyị na-ewu ngwa AI, usoro automation, na ngwa ọgbara ọhụrụ na-eme ka ọrụ gị dị mfe, belata mgbalị aka, ma nyere azụmahịa gị aka ịga n'ihu ngwa ngwa.

aboutPage.title: Ndị Anyị Bụ
aboutPage.subtitle: Iwu usoro nwere ọgụgụ isi na-agbanwe otú azụmahịa si arụ ọrụ
aboutPage.storyP1: E hiwere Sannex na ebumnuche doro anya: ime ka teknụzụ dị elu dị mfe na bara uru maka azụmahịa Africa. N'ịbụ ndị nọ na Lagos, Nigeria, anyị bụ ọkachamara na automation nke AI na-akwado, mmepe webụ ahaziri iche, na njikọ usoro na-enweghị nsogbu.
aboutPage.storyP2: Anyị arụọla ọrụ na ụka na-eme ka ọrụ ha na-akpaghị aka, mahadum na-ewu usoro njikwa, mmalite na-ewepụta ikpo okwu ịkwụ ụgwọ, na ụlọ ọrụ na-eme ka usoro ọrụ ha dị mma. Ọrụ ọ bụla na-akụziri anyị ihe ọhụrụ, anyị na-eweta ọmụma ahụ na ihe ịma aka ọzọ.
aboutPage.storyP3: Ụzọ anyị na-ejikọta nka teknụzụ dị elu na echiche azụmahịa bara uru. Anyị anaghị naanị ewu software—anyị na-ewu ngwọta na-aga n'ihu, usoro na-adịgide, na mmekọrịta na-eto eto.
aboutPage.value1Desc: Anyị na-ewu teknụzụ na-edozi ezigbo nsogbu ma na-emepụta uru a na-ahụ anya nye ndị ahịa anyị.
aboutPage.value2Desc: Anyị na-anọgide n'ihu usoro teknụzụ, na-eweta AI na automation kachasị ọhụrụ na oru ngo ọ bụla.
aboutPage.value3Desc: Anyị na-arụ ọrụ dị ka ndokwu nke otu gị, na-ahụ na ngwọta dabara na ebumnuche azụmahịa gị.
aboutPage.readySubtitle: Ma ị chọrọ automation AI, ngwa webụ ahaziri iche, ma ọ bụ ndụmọdụ teknụzụ, anyị nọ ebe a iji nyere gị aka wuo ihe dị ukwuu.
